actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to establish a cooperative basic automotive research program within the Executive Branch; to provide for authorizations and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations not to exceed $800,000,000 to be derived from the Energy Security Trust Fund and allocated by the President to carry out cooperative basic automotive research to advance the state of knowledge underlying automotive technology.

titles.title: A bill to establish a cooperative basic automotive research program within the Executive Branch; to provide for authorizations and for other purposes.
